Articles.Content:
> 
> Just look at his face, isn't he adorable?

Morning Kasper!

Also that linked image just shows the maintainance page.
Shove the hypecoal into the hypecontainer, and make the hype train hype! Hallelujah!

> 
> Chrome shows images for me. However the store page has the Kerbal with a white background while the main website shows a Kerbal with a space background.

I'm telling you every other minute it keeps flipping back and forth between text and images.

> 
> That is brilliant! Have some rep!

I'm using [https://code.google.com/p/irssi-libnotify/source/browse/notify.pl](https://code.google.com/p/irssi-libnotify/source/browse/notify.pl) so Irssi will send a desktop notification if there is a word that /hilight highlights, in this case KSP.

In the other end, I've modified my dota 2 auto acceptor: 

     import glibimport dbusfrom dbus.mainloop.glib import DBusGMainLoopimport subprocessmessagelist = []def notifications(bus, message):	messagelist = [arg for arg in message.get_args_list()]	print messagelist	if dbus.String(u'Kerbal Space Program') in messagelist:		print 'match founded'		subprocess.call(['mplayer', 'taking the hobbits to isengard-uE-1RPDqJAY.mp3'])DBusGMainLoop(set_as_default=True)bus = dbus.SessionBus()bus.add_match_string_non_blocking("eavesdrop=true, interface='org.freedesktop.Notifications', member='Notify'")bus.add_message_filter(notifications)mainloop = glib.MainLoop()print 'Dota 2 Auto Accepter armed'mainloop.run()

so it will play some sounds if it detects a desktop notification containing KSP. Now I can do my homeworks now

> 
> Chrome shows images for me. However the store page has the Kerbal with a white background while the main website shows a Kerbal with a space background.

I'm ctrl+F5ng on both browsers on both pages and no background OR image.

41 pages and we will have broken the hype-barrier

anything could happen then

like maybe the release of 1.0

not that I'm saying Squad is waiting for this to happen

but I'm not going to not say that either

also, it has been the 28th for the poor people of Kiribati for almost 4 hours

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T13:46:14Z" title="04/27/2015 01:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Invader Myk**
  
a full page filled in the time it took me to write and post this

> 
> Shove the hypecoal into the hypecontainer, and make the hype train hype! Hallelujah!

I've always been confused by this, is it a hype-steam train or a hype-diesel train? Or is it one of those newer hype-hybrid locomotives that runs on hype-tears and hype-hope?

Just in case you guys get tired, here is a 14 minutes rap song:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rKTUAESacQM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> I've always been confused by this, is it a hype-steam train or a hype-diesel train? Or is it one of those newer hype-hybrid locomotives that runs on hype-tears and hype-hope?

It accepts all sorts of hype. Even junk hype like the delorian.

> 
> I've always been confused by this, is it a hype-steam train or a hype-diesel train? Or is it one of those newer hype-hybrid locomotives that runs on hype-tears and hype-hope?

It's a hype rocket fuel steam train. Duh.

Matt is pretty excited. He's agonizing on the FINAL COUNTDOWN to v1.0 !!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/126125469" width="1280" height="720" frameborder="0" title="KSP v1.0 Trailer, " the="" final="" countdown"="" version"="" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> I've always been confused by this, is it a hype-steam train or a hype-diesel train? Or is it one of those newer hype-hybrid locomotives that runs on hype-tears and hype-hope?

Can't it be both at the same time?

> 
> Just look at his face, isn't he adorable?

his face tells me he enjoys thousands of people tortured by waiting

> 
> I have to go. But I'll leave one last post here on the way to 300 (maybe)

On the HYPE TRAIN...

![w2GOxFN.gif](http://i.imgur.com/w2GOxFN.gif)

The only speed is LUDICROUS SPEED!

> 
> It accepts all sorts of hype. Even junk hype like the delorian.

Can we sacrifice the most hyped person aboard to make us go faster?

> 
> On the HYPE TRAIN...
> [http://i.imgur.com/w2GOxFN.gif](http://i.imgur.com/w2GOxFN.gif)
> 
> The only speed is LUDICROUS SPEED!

But that's plaid...

> 
> his face tells me he enjoys thousands of people tortured by waiting

I see nothing on those pages.

Should I dare try IE?

The planet's moved! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I think that once the kerbal and Kerbin align, release will come.

> 
> Are you going to send Jeb up first or Valentina?

Bill is who I want to send up first.

> 
> I've always been confused by this, is it a hype-steam train or a hype-diesel train? Or is it one of those newer hype-hybrid locomotives that runs on hype-tears and hype-hope?

Actually I heard it runs on F5-fuel.

> 
> the planet's moved! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> i think that once the kerbal and kerbin align, release will come.

i see only three lights!
come on!!! 40 pages to go!!!!
Now off to visit my nan in hospital. Give me something to cheer me up when I get home Squad. Riding this hype train to 300 pages and beyond!

> 
> The planet's moved! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> I think that once the kerbal and Kerbin align, release will come.

You mean once he slams into Kerbin?

> 
> Wait, guys, I bet the devs are waiting for us to hit 300 to release it....
> FASTER!!!!

Post rate at maximum!!
